docs.snippet: Ryan received a multiyear extension, but if the Jets fail to return to the postseason, the team will be able to escape without much financial penalty after 2015....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan received a multiyear extension, but if the Jets fail to return to the postseason, the team will be able to escape without much financial penalty after 2015.
docs.abstract: Ben Shpigel On Pro Football column holds that while multiyear contract extension gives New York Jets coach Rex Ryan some job security, if Jets fail to return to the postseason, team will be able to escape without much financial penalty after 2015.

headline.main: With New Contract, Rex Ryan Has Security With Jets, to an Extent
headline.print_headline: With New Contract, Ryan Has Security, to an Extent

docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Seattle Seahawks wide receiver Percy Harvin is still going through concussion testing and has not been cleared for the NFC championship game against San Francisco 49ers; other news noted.

docs.abstract: New England Patriots running back LeGarrette Blount bursts into the national spotlight after establishing franchise records for all-purpose yards and rushing touchdowns in AFC divisional playoff game against Indianapolis Colts.

docs.abstract: Preview of NFL Conference Championship Matchups between Denver Broncos and New England Patriots in the AFC, and Seattle Seahawks and San Francisco 49ers in the NFC.

docs.snippet: At the University of Texas, football is religion. At Penn State University, they need football for redemption. So when these storied programs hired black head coaches within days of each other to return them to past glory, it was a major moment fo...
docs.lead_paragraph: At the University of Texas, football is religion. At Penn State University, they need football for redemption. So when these storied programs hired black head coaches within days of each other to return them to past glory, it was a major moment for a sport that has been among the slowest to promote African-American leaders at the highest level.

headline.main: 'Historic' Black Coach Hires at Texas, Penn State
headline.print_headline: 'Historic' Black Coach Hires at Texas, Penn State

docs.snippet: Fox, CBS and ESPN have submitted bids for the rights to broadcast as many as eight Thursday night National Football League games, three people familiar with the bidding process told Reuters, as bidders began assembling for what is expected to be a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fox, CBS and ESPN have submitted bids for the rights to broadcast as many as eight Thursday night National Football League games, three people familiar with the bidding process told Reuters, as bidders began assembling for what is expected to be a highly contested auction.

headline.main: Exclusive: Fox, CBS, ESPN Bid for Thursday Night NFL Games
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Fox, CBS, ESPN Bid for Thursday Night NFL Games
